    • isOperationPermitted

      boolean isOperationPermitted(Class<? extends org.identityconnectors.framework.api.operations.APIOperation> operation) throws org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException
      Checks the operation permission before execution.
      Parameters:
      operation -
      Returns:
      if denied is true and the onDeny equals org.forgerock.openidm.provisioner.openicf.commons.OperationOptionInfoHelper.OnDenyAction#DO_NOTHING returns false else true
      Throws:
      org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException - if denied is true and the onDeny equals org.forgerock.openidm.provisioner.openicf.commons.OperationOptionInfoHelper.OnDenyAction#THROW_EXCEPTION

    • resolveQualifiedId

      URI resolveQualifiedId(org.identityconnectors.framework.common.objects.Uid uid)
      Generate the fully qualified id from unqualified object Uid

      The result id will be system/[endSystemName]/[objectType]/[escapedObjectId]

      Parameters:
      uid - original un escaped unique identifier of the object
      Returns:
